name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dallas Robert SCOTT, Appellant

casebody.head_matter:
376 A.2d 247
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Dallas Robert SCOTT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted May 23, 1977.
Decided Aug. 17, 1977.
Bruce D. Foreman, Harrisburg, for appellant.
LeRoy S. Zimmerman, Dist. Atty., Marion E. MacIntyre, Second Asst. Dist. Atty., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and PACKEL, JJ.
